attributes.action: Force Peterborough City Council to Plan Roadwork in Logical and Coherant manner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Peterborough has been brought to a standstill by the debacle of roadworks planning in the city. Roads are closed and or made one way, diversions are set up and then MORE roadworks are conducted on the diversions.
Journey times have gone from 5 or 10 minutes to an hour.
We demand a full public apology for this mess and a review of roadworks planning in the city.
